articles.author: CNA
articles.title: Latin America and Caribbean surpass million COVID-19 deaths - CNA
articles.description: More than one million people have died of Covid-19 in Latin America and the Caribbean since the coronavirus pandemic began, according to an AFP count based on official figures as of Friday at 2105 GMT.
articles.content: MONTEVIDEO: More than one million people have died of COVID-19 in Latin America and the Caribbean since the coronavirus pandemic began, according to an AFP count based on official figures as of Frida… [+2324 chars]

articles.author: Ronan McGreevy
articles.title: Biden says Taoiseach gave ‘devastating’ critique of US Covid policy - The Irish Times
articles.description: Micheál Martin is alleged to have said America ‘can’t lead’ after Trump’s handling of pandemic
articles.content:
US president Joe Biden has said remarks made by Taoiseach Micheál Martin brought home to him how badly Donald Trump had handled the Covid-19 pandemic.

articles.title: Canada's first-dose vaccinations surpass U.S., as American daily rate declines - CTV News
articles.description: The U.S. is still far ahead of Canada when it comes to people who are fully vaccinated against COVID-19. But its vaccination rate has slowed considerably, while Canada has now surpassed America when it comes to one-dose vaccines per capita.
articles.content:
TORONTO --
